name: revisualization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of imagining, remembering, or showing someone or something again, often in a slightly different way: The exhibition provides a kind of revisualization of marriage through photography over the past seven decades. The production was praised for its handsome revizualization of the original designs. All the artworks are stunning revisualizations of contemporary themes.
